February 2024.title: Interim Budget 2024-25 Economic Framework
February 2024.summary: Finance Minister presented Interim Budget 2024-25 outlining economic priorities for the upcoming fiscal year, focusing on infrastructure development and agriculture support.
keyTakeaways: Infrastructure investment allocation of â‚¹11.11 lakh crore
Focus on rural development and agriculture support
Tax relief measures for middle-class taxpayers

February 2024.title: India-UAE Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement Implementation
February 2024.summary: India and UAE signed comprehensive economic partnership agreement enhancing bilateral trade relations and strategic cooperation in various sectors including energy, technology, and defense.
keyTakeaways: Bilateral trade target of $100 billion by 2030
Enhanced cooperation in renewable energy sector
Streamlined visa processes for business travelers
Technology transfer agreements in AI and space

February 2024.title: National Education Policy Implementation Progress Review
February 2024.summary: Government conducted comprehensive review of National Education Policy implementation showing significant progress in digital learning infrastructure and curriculum reforms across educational institutions.
keyTakeaways: New curriculum framework implemented in 40% institutions
Skill-based education programs expanded to 1000+ colleges
Teacher training programs reached 5 lakh educators

March 2024.title: Holi Festival Cultural Celebrations Nationwide
March 2024.summary: India celebrated Holi festival with grand cultural programs showcasing the country's rich traditions and promoting cultural tourism while maintaining COVID-19 safety protocols.
keyTakeaways: Local economy benefited from festival activities

March 2024.title: Space Technology Mission Success - ISRO Satellite Launch
March 2024.summary: ISRO successfully launched advanced earth observation satellite enhancing India's space technology capabilities and strengthening position in global space industry.
keyTakeaways: Advanced imaging technology for agriculture monitoring

April 2024.title: Digital India Initiative Milestone Achievement
April 2024.summary: Digital India program achieved significant milestone with 95% population coverage of digital services and enhanced cybersecurity infrastructure to support digital transformation.
keyTakeaways: Rural connectivity improved through optical fiber
Digital literacy programs reached 10 crore citizens

May 2024.title: Healthcare Infrastructure Development in Rural Areas
May 2024.summary: Government launched comprehensive healthcare infrastructure development program targeting rural areas with focus on primary healthcare delivery and medical education expansion.
keyTakeaways: Telemedicine services expanded to remote areas
Health insurance coverage extended to 2 crore families

June 2024.title: Environment Conservation Initiative - Green India Mission
June 2024.summary: Green India Mission launched nationwide tree plantation drive targeting carbon neutrality goals and biodiversity conservation while engaging local communities in environmental protection.
keyTakeaways: 10 crore saplings planted across the country

July 2024.title: Economic Growth Performance Q1 2024-25
July 2024.summary: India's economy demonstrated robust growth performance in Q1 2024-25 with GDP expansion driven by manufacturing sector strength and domestic consumption increase.

August 2024.title: Independence Day Celebrations and Cultural Heritage
August 2024.summary: India celebrated 78th Independence Day with grand celebrations highlighting cultural heritage, technological achievements, and progress in various sectors while honoring freedom fighters.
keyTakeaways: Freedom fighters honored across the country
Youth participation in patriotic activities increased

September 2024.title: Agricultural Technology Revolution and Farmer Support
September 2024.summary: Agricultural sector witnessed technology revolution with implementation of precision farming techniques, drone technology adoption, and enhanced farmer support through digital platforms.
keyTakeaways: Precision farming adopted by 50 lakh farmers
Digital platform for crop advisory launched

October 2024.title: Infrastructure Development Projects Acceleration
October 2024.summary: Major infrastructure development projects accelerated including highway construction, railway modernization, and smart city development initiatives across multiple states.
keyTakeaways: Smart city projects initiated in 50 cities
Metro connectivity expanded in tier-2 cities
Rural connectivity improved through all-weather roads

November 2024.title: Defense Technology Advancement and Border Security
November 2024.summary: Defense sector achieved significant technological advancement with indigenous weapon systems development and enhanced border security infrastructure strengthening national defense capabilities.
keyTakeaways: Strategic partnership with allied nations strengthened

December 2024.title: Sports Excellence and International Achievements
December 2024.summary: Indian athletes achieved remarkable success in international competitions while sports infrastructure development received major boost through government initiatives and private partnerships.

January 2025.title: Energy Transition and Renewable Power Expansion
January 2025.summary: India accelerated energy transition towards renewable sources with major solar and wind power projects commissioning while reducing dependence on fossil fuel imports.
keyTakeaways: Solar power installations crossed 100 GW milestone
Wind energy projects expanded in coastal states

February 2025.title: Transportation Revolution and Urban Mobility
February 2025.summary: Transportation sector underwent major transformation with electric vehicle adoption, metro network expansion, and integrated mobility solutions implementation in major cities.

March 2025.title: Science and Research Innovation Breakthrough
March 2025.summary: Indian scientific community achieved major breakthrough in biotechnology and space research while strengthening research infrastructure and international scientific collaboration.

April 2025.title: Digital Governance and Citizen Services Enhancement
April 2025.summary: Digital governance initiatives received major boost with citizen services digitization, AI integration in government processes, and enhanced cybersecurity measures implementation.

May 2025.title: Healthcare System Strengthening and Medical Innovation
May 2025.summary: Healthcare system received comprehensive strengthening with medical innovation advancement, pharmaceutical manufacturing boost, and healthcare accessibility improvement in rural areas.
keyTakeaways: Healthcare accessibility improved in rural areas

June 2025.title: Climate Action and Environmental Protection
June 2025.summary: Climate action initiatives intensified with carbon neutrality roadmap implementation, biodiversity conservation programs expansion, and renewable energy integration acceleration.

July 2025.title: International Relations and Diplomatic Success
July 2025.summary: India strengthened international relations through strategic partnerships, multilateral engagement, and diplomatic initiatives while enhancing global influence and cooperation.
keyTakeaways: Strategic partnerships with key nations strengthened

August 2025.title: Economic Recovery and Growth Momentum
August 2025.summary: India's economy showed robust performance with GDP growth rate of 7.2% in Q1 2025-26, maintaining its position as the fastest-growing major economy. The growth was driven by strong domestic consumption and manufacturing sector expansion.
keyTakeaways: GDP growth rate reached 7.2% in Q1 2025-26
Manufacturing sector contributed significantly to growth
Services sector remained the largest contributor
Inflation remained within RBI's target range
